about.

Hello world. I am Woon Zhen Fei, a web developer.

I have past working experience as an Operation Executive and Service Technician in different field. During these jobs, I realized I would really like to have a job that spends a lot of time in front of a computer and so began my journey to learn web development.

I have prior knowledge about programming (C programming and MATLAB) during my university years. Since I started my web-development journey, I have successfully completed CS50: Introduction to Computer Science, a Harvard online course. Then, I started learning through The Odin Project. I have since completed the 'Foundations' course, 'Intermediate HTML and CSS' and 'Javascript' courses in the Full Stack path.

This 'homepage' is actually a project of the final lesson in 'Advanced HTML and CSS' course. I did not really follow the design template provided as I want to make it unique and use it as my first actual portfolio.

Now, I am looking for my first job in web development.
